name: The Brick Factory
description:
We are the Brick Factory, a digital agency headquartered in Washington, DC. We plan and execute world-class digital campaigns for non-profits, trade associations, advocacy groups, and brands. While we are a relatively new company, having launched October 1, 2011, the team behind the Brick Factory has been working together to deliver solutions to our clients for years. The Brick Factory was founded by former employees of The Bivings Group, a pioneer in the digital space.
To learn more about our background, check out the links below and explore our staff biographies.
READ MORE...
